title: Hour 3 - (05-13-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - (05-13-20)
description:
Dan wants a clear understanding of the reopening of sports and what that will look like per state. Dan says he is not weaponizing the pandemic and how his opinion is not political.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
